last_episode_to_air.name: Where Does Everyone Suddenly Go?
last_episode_to_air.overview: Shulem has confrontations with Akiva, Racheli, Nechama and Nuchem. Ruchami fights for her life, and her baby's.

name: Shtisel
overview: Akiva and Shulem Shtisel, father and son, sit on a little balcony overlooking streets of the Geula neighborhood of Jerusalem. A year has passed since the mother died. All the other children have left the nest, and only Shulam and Akiva remain - quarreling, making up, and laughing about themselves and the rest of the world. All will change when Akiva meets Elisheva.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A Haredi family living in an ultra-Orthodox neighborhood of Jerusalem reckons with love, loss and the doldrums of daily life.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: This season, Shulem's brother returns to Israel, Akiva pursues a love interest and Giti faces more parenting dilemmas.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: It's four years later and the widowed Shtisel patriarch is searching for a new match, while Akiva tries to figure out how to balance love and art.

episodes.name: Everybody Are Looking for Love
episodes.overview: As he mourns his late mother alongside his father Shulem, Akiva starts a new job where he meets a woman named Elisheva who diverts his attention.

episodes.name: Elisheva Agrees to Meet Akiva
episodes.overview: While Akiva looks to get better acquainted with Elisheva, his sister Giti tries to figure out her husband's whereabouts.

episodes.name: Shulem Pushes Akiva to Get Engaged
episodes.overview: Giti must secure a new opportunity in secret as Shulem urges Akiva to meet with a woman named Esti.

episodes.name: Giti and Akiva Find Jobs
episodes.overview: Akiva and Giti each consider a financial proposition while their brother Zvi Arye looks to resolve a pesky problem at home with his wife Tovi.

episodes.name: Akiva hasitates
episodes.overview: A major event leaves Akiva with second thoughts and troubles Shulem, who has other concerns about his co-worker Aliza.

episodes.name: Shulem Feels Guilt
episodes.overview: Shulem and Akiva deal with the repercussions of their fallout as Giti and her children cope with the realities of their home life.

episodes.name: Akiva's Portrait
episodes.overview: After a robber invades Giti's home, Shulem and Akiva both experience revelations at their respective jobs.

episodes.name: Oy No No
episodes.overview: An incident spurs Shulem to ponder his mortality as Akiva helps his friend after trying to connect with Elisheva.

episodes.name: The Baby
episodes.overview: In the pursuit of romance, Akiva and Shulem both take bold steps. Meanwhile, Giti faces resistance from her daughter Ruchami over family news.

episodes.name: The White Man
episodes.overview: A significant shift takes place at Shulem's school. A stipulation affects Akiva's marital status. Elsewhere, a familiar face returns.

episodes.name: Kolonia
episodes.overview: An admission leads to an unexpected outcome for Akiva, Giti privately wrestles with a life-changing choice and their grandmother faces hardship.

episodes.name: Cry Here
episodes.overview: Lipa adjusts to home, Gitti takes a vacation. Shulem pushes his mother to give up the TV. Akiva tells Shulem about his agreement with Elisheva.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A Haredi family living in an ultra-Orthodox neighborhood of Jerusalem reckons with love, loss and the doldrums of daily life.

episodes.name: Lemons
episodes.overview: Shulem's brother Nuchem pays the family a timely visit with his daughter Libbi. Elsewhere, Giti and her husband Lippe respond to a peculiar ad.

episodes.name: A Very Important Friend
episodes.overview: While Libbi encourages Akiva to seek artistic inspiration, Giti and Lippe find themselves in a debate over a baby name.

episodes.name: Shteingletz and Shutenshtein
episodes.overview: As Giti struggles to forgive Lippe, Shulem and Nuchem investigate a matchmaking mystery involving Libbi.

episodes.name: Mauricio
episodes.overview: Ruchami and a student named Hanina become closer. Akiva and Libbi confront the tension in the air. Akiva's grandmother receives unfortunate news.

episodes.name: Love Pains
episodes.overview: After Akiva is awarded an arts residency, his acceptance speech takes a turn. Giti and Lippe deal with the ramifications of Ruchami's impromptu wedding.

episodes.name: Snow
episodes.overview: Matters of the heart lead Akiva and Shulem to each make rash decisions while Zvi Arye grapples with an important question on his mind.

episodes.name: The Lost Children's Good Will
episodes.overview: Akiva seeks space away from his father. Giti tries to facilitate a resolution for Ruchami's situation.

episodes.name: Jerusalem Customs
episodes.overview: Akiva gets immersed in the company of a fellow artist as the Shtisel family quickly comes together after a somber discovery.

episodes.name: The Consoled
episodes.overview: As the Shtisels mourn a loss, Akiva must choose between his career and family. Meanwhile, Giti and Lippe force an end to their conflict with Ruchami.

episodes.name: The Tragic Symphony
episodes.overview: Nuchem asks Shulem for help as Akiva faces a roadblock in his efforts to move forward with his life.

episodes.name: Concealment in the Concealment
episodes.overview: While artistic opportunities yield different results for Akiva and Zvi Arye, Giti and Lippe make some seismic changes within their own family.

episodes.name: Last Of The Season
episodes.overview: A career triumph comes at a price for Akiva while Giti's family must come to terms with issues on multiple fronts.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: This season, Shulem's brother returns to Israel, Akiva pursues a love interest and Giti faces more parenting dilemmas.

episodes.name: White Flags
episodes.overview: Deep in grief, Akiva struggles to fit into the art world. Shulem makes a mistake, threatening his place in the Cheder. Yosa'le meets the wrong girl.

episodes.name: The Bird
episodes.overview: Shulem carves his own path, enraging the community. Hanina seeks guidance to break an impasse with Ruchami. Akiva tries to win back his paintings.

episodes.name: Public Telephone
episodes.overview: Yosa'le keeps getting calls, but the line is silent. Under pressure from Giti, he pursues meetings with Shira Levinson. Akiva makes a blunder.

episodes.name: First Smile
episodes.overview: Akiva finds a surprising savior to help with his daughter's situation. Ruchami makes a difficult decision. Shulem stumbles forth with Nechama.

episodes.name: White
episodes.overview: Yosa'le struggles with his feelings for the two Shiras. Ruchami and Hanina come to the same conclusion without realizing it. Lippe has an idea.

episodes.name: Cestrum Nocturnum
episodes.overview: Akiva panics when he finds himself getting closer to Racheli. Zvi Arie and Tovi have opposing perspectives. Shulem's heart aches, in different ways.

episodes.name: A Long Path that is Short
episodes.overview: Hanina is worried about Ruchami's predicament. Akiva and Racheli discover their truths by enacting a fiction for the social worker.

episodes.name: Mame, Mame
episodes.overview: Akiva is still blinded by his love for Libbi and can't fully see Racheli. Yosa'le reunites with the first Shira, but Giti disapproves.

episodes.name: Where Does Everyone Suddenly Go?
episodes.overview: Shulem has confrontations with Akiva, Racheli, Nechama and Nuchem. Ruchami fights for her life, and her baby's.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: It's four years later and the widowed Shtisel patriarch is searching for a new match, while Akiva tries to figure out how to balance love and art.
